Articles.Content: Could someone please direct me to the pictures of the new planets?, i cant seem to find them even when i go in the search bar and on novasiliskos profile page to look where he posted? Thanks.

Nova's Development album is on the left bar on his profile (maybe you can't see it due to your post count).

The 0.17 discussion thread is your best bet to find pictures, or you can try this one.

Oh, and I'm sure you can also find the latest posts of a person, so you could check Nova's posts too.

Post above has good link, also Nova has been posting some pictures in his profile: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/album.php?albumid=5

Locked since question is answered
